name: UTAU Sequence Text File
summary: Learn about .UST files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: UST files can be played back in the UTAU, and they can be exported to MIDI (.MID) or VOCALOID (.VSQ) formats or rendered to a .WAV file. UTAU can also import VSQ and MIDI files and convert them to UST files.

description: File created by UTAU, a vocal synthesizer similar to YAMAHA's VOCALOID and VOCALOID2 software; supports musical notes as well as dynamics, vibrato, pitch, and lyrics; often used for storing music for Japanese vocal androids, or "vocaloids," which are synthesized voices often used by sing and dance games.
